title: The Farmer's Garden
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A specialty and gourmet food store with a small cafe and juice bar inside. Vegans could get roasted veg, grilled aubergine with pomegranate, black bean, avocado & sweet potato bagel, salad, smoothie made with choice of coconut or almond milk. Sells fresh organic fruit and vegetable from local partners. Uses recyclable carrying material, no plastic bags.
streetAddress: Al Wasl Square, Shop 33 Al Wasl Rd
